name: KLH or DNP-KLH 0
description: **2** Inject 100 µg of KLH or DNP-KLH precipitated in alum in a total volume of 300 µl \(volume adjusted with PBS) into the peritoneal cavity.

name: diluted serum 0
description: Collect serum at d 0, d 7, and d 14 and make serial dilutions in PBS.

name: DNP-ovalbumin 0
description: **3** Coat 96-well MaxiSorp<sup>TM</sup> ELISA plates with 50 µl/well of DNP-ovalbumin \(5 µg/ml in PBS), incubate overnight at 4 ˚C \(3).

name: DNP-ovalbumin 1
description: **4** Wash with PBS + 0.05% Tween 20, block for 3 h with PBS + 2.5% bovine serum albumin.

name: diluted serum 1
description: **5** Add diluted serum in triplicates, incubate overnight at 4 ˚C. Wash 3x with PBS + 0.05% Tween 20.

name: diluted serum 2
description: **6** Add alkaline phospatase-labeled mouse IgM- and subclass IgG-specific antibodies \(working dilutions 1:250 – 1:500 in PBS + 2.5% bovine serum albumin).

name: diluted serum 3
description: Incubate at 25 ˚C for 1 h. Wash 5x with PBS + 0.05% Tween 20.

name: alkaline phosphatase substrate solution 0
description: **7** Add 100 µl per well of alkaline phosphatase substrate solution.

name: optical density 0
description: Read optical density of each well at 405 nm at 10 min and 20 min after substrate addition.
